alert.note: Alert for Adams; Brown; Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:54AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MASON, ROBERTSON, LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN BROWN, SOUTHERN ADAMS, SOUTHEASTERN PIKE AND SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 400 AM EDT... At 254 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Belfast to 11 miles west of Cynthiana, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, Maysville, Wheelersburg, Washington, West Union, New Boston, Manchester, Aberdeen, Vanceburg, South Webster, Lewisburg, Rosemount, Clarktown, Camp Dix, Rome, Lucasville, Foxport, Head of Grassy, Tollesboro and Sciotodale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
